==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Servan:''' Hey, wanna see something new?
:{{DIcon}} Is this another one...?
::'''Servan:''' Huh? What do you mean by "another one"?
::'''Servan:''' I have something new here that you've definitely never seen before!
::'''Servan:''' Look at this! It can be squeezed into various shapes and can stick to the wall. It's slime paste!
::'''Servan:''' And this one is called "Up, Up, and Away"! Just rub it between your hands and it will rise up into the air!
::'''Servan:''' How do you like it? Fun, isn't it? Buy it for yourself or bring it back home to your kids, it's all good!
::'''Servan:''' Hey, d&mdash;don't go...
:{{DIcon}} Bye!
::'''Servan:''' D&mdash;Don't walk away! Let me just give you a quick demo!
{{Dialogue End}}
